hero.title: Creating modern web solutions for business
hero.subtitle: Development of interfaces in React/Next.js with responsive layout for mobile devices. Structured component organization with reusability and clear naming. Animation and section adjustments according to the provided design.

about.title: About me
about.text: I am a digital architect merging design and technology into immersive cybernetic landscapes. My work transforms complex ideas into elegant, interactive narratives that push the limits of human-digital interaction.

frontend.title: I am a frontend developer.
frontend.text: I craft digital experiences that blur the lines between human perception and technological innovation. My work transforms complex systems into elegant, intuitive interfaces that breathe life into abstract concepts.

technical.text: Technologies that I have studied and regularly use in my projectsTechnologies that I have studied and regularly use in my projects

nextjs-i18n-setup.excerpt: How I added multi-language routing and header translations.
